body:
* [MONGOID-4444](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4444) Don't include PersistenceContext methods in prohibted field names, include Clients::Options instead
* [MONGOID-4466](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4466) Duplicate of MONGOID-4444
* [MONGOID-4453](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4453) Ignore attr_readonly when defined on foreign key fields
* [MONGOID-4445](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4445) Remove unnecessary extra inverse criterion when retrieving has_many objects
* [MONGOID-4451](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4451) Unexpected exception when using a "destructive" field
* Make _destroy alias flagged_for_destroy? (@danielfarrell)

name: 7.0.0.beta
body:
This is a beta release of Mongoid 7.0. It's is meant for testing and not for production. The API may also evolve as further betas and release candidates are released. Please report any issues in the [jira project for Mongoid](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID).

The release contains a large refactor of the way associations are defined between models. There are some behavior changes but the API is mostly unchanged. Please see the below list for details on bug fixes, behavior changes and API adjustments:

* Provide all dependent options that ActiveRecord has (documentation [here](http://guides.rubyonrails.org/association_basics.html))
* [MONGOID-3261](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3261) Objects are built twice when relation is specified in the constructor.
* [MONGOID-3586](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3586) Persistence inconsistency.
* [MONGOID-3678](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3678) Change #matches? to #_matches? to avoid relation name clash
* [MONGOID-3765](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3765) `determine_inverse_foreign_key` does not observe customized foreign key
* [MONGOID-3797](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3797) HABM relations are not saved correctly on both sides if providing just model_ids
* [MONGOID-3809](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3809) Duplicate embedded document created on save (repro included)
* [MONGOID-3829](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3829) Setting referenced-in relation breaks substitution of the inverse relation.
* [MONGOID-3830](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3830) Range field type/extension seems to have a weird bug if given a string
* [MONGOID-3831](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3831) Mongoize to a String when Range#mongoize receives a string instead of Range
* [MONGOID-3850](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3850) Coexisting instances are able to bypass the uniqueness validator on embedded docs
* [MONGOID-3876](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3876) delete_all conditions don't work with aliased fields.
* [MONGOID-3893](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3893) Adding pointers in embedded document corrupts the pointed document
* [MONGOID-3901](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3901) Create the dependent behavior restrict_with_error
* [MONGOID-3917](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3917) Create child object with inheritance and nested attributes.
* [MONGOID-4054](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4054) (Works as designed) Mongoid localized field not being set in first form submission
* [MONGOID-4100](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4100) Ensure that type gets set for first_or methods on polymorphic objects
*[MONGOID-4210](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4210) Embedded document unexpected autosave behavior
* [MONGOID-4273](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4273) Self-referencing has_and_belongs_to_many not updated properly
* [MONGOID-4282](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4282) Foreign key string are not properly evolved to ObjectIds in #where for polymorphic relations
* [MONGOID-4309](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4309) Infinite Loop In Callbacks
* [MONGOID-4427](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4427) Updating an embedded document triggers an unnecessary unset
* [MONGOID-4435](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4435) Cloning Criteria does not preserve read preference
* [MONGOID-4436](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4436) Duplicate of [MONGOID-2882](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-2882)
* [MONGOID-4442](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4442) Missing Mongoid::Relations::Cascading::DeleteAll
* [MONGOID-4444](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4444) Field names display and options are on prohibited_methods list
* [MONGOID-4258](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4258) Autosave does not cascade unless all items are "dirty"
* [MONGOID-4259](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4259) "dependent: :destroy" option destroys out-of-date relation
* [MONGOID-4354](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4354) Provide more helpful error message when _type field doesn't correspond to a Class name
* [MONGOID-4431](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4431) Avoid using synced and syncable internally so as not to clash with potential attribute names
* [MONGOID-4445](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4445) Remove unnecessary extra inverse criterion when retrieving has_many objects
* [MONGOID-4447](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4447) Support passing a document to $unwind operator in aggregation
* [MONGOID-4448](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4448) Add global config option to always create indexes in the background
* [MONGOID-4449](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4449) Avoid using #base and #target method names on proxy objects
* [MONGOID-4455](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4455) Make readonly attributes behavior consistent with ActiveRecord
* [MONGOID-4461](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4461) Encourage referring to MongoDB docs for supported map reduce options

This version of Mongoid supports (and requires at least) Rails 5.1.

* [MONGOID-4440](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4440) Support Rails 5.1

This patch release has the following changes:

* Update config template (@ivanovaleksey)
* [MONGOID-3806](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3806) use where with delete conditions instead of driver API for #delete_all.
* Fix YARD doc for Criteria#merge method (@ivanovaleksey)
* Add support for matching index of an array (@loganyu)
* Refactor eager preload to avoid stack overflow (@val)
* Small improvement to spec for Touchable (@johnnyshields)
* [MONGOID-4415](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4415) Ensure that storage options of parent are used for embedded docs when persisting
* [MONGOID-4319](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4319) Don't replace relation if new one is identical to existing.
* Fix sort to id_sort option typos (@hartator)
* [MONGOID-4416](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4416) Don't run touch callbacks when #touch is called on an object from a relation's callback 
* [MONGOID-4418](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4418) Don't allow PersistenceContext method as field names
* Fix compatibility of Mongoid::Contextual::None with other contexts by adding distinct (@ElMassimo)
* Update mongoid-queries.txt (@wndfly)
* Update mongoid-queries.txt with valid ruby (@arbourd)
* [RUBY-1207](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/RUBY-1207) Note that username and password are required for most auth mechanisms.
* [MONGOID-4426](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4426) Account for nil value in Hash field before setting
* Allow raw bson regexp query criteria on fields specified as Strings
* [MONGOID-4425](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4425) #as_document continues to return BSON::Document, but use internal api method #as_attributes otherwise
* [MONGOID-4431](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4431) Avoid use of certain names in Synchronization module so not to interfer with attribute names
* [MONGOID-3678](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3678) Change #matches? to #_matches? to avoid relation name clash
* [MONGOID-4435](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4435) Don't convert option keys to String from Symbols when cloning criteria
* Travis and Evergreen improvements
* API docs available at https://docs.mongodb.com/mongoid/6.1/api/

Tickets that are closed as of this release without changes:
* [MONGOID-1963](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-1963)
* [MONGOID-2515](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-2515)
* [MONGOID-3090](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3090)
* [MONGOID-3602](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3602)
* [MONGOID-3616](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3616)
* [MONGOID-3657](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3657)
* [MONGOID-3658](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3658)
* [MONGOID-3666](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3666)
* [MONGOID-3715](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3715)
* [MONGOID-3742](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3742)
* [MONGOID-3759](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3759)
* [MONGOID-3775](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3775)
* [MONGOID-3840](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3840)
* [MONGOID-3869](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3869)
* [MONGOID-3872](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3872)
* [MONGOID-3886](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3886)
* [MONGOID-3912](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3912)
* [MONGOID-4054](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4054)
* [MONGOID-4099](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4099)

This patch level release has the following changes:

* Add support for matching the index of an array (@loganyu)
* [MONGOID-4428](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4428) Ensure that a BSON::Regexp::Raw object is serialized to a BSON regex when querying a field with type String. Also allow a BSON::Regexp::Raw object to be compiled to a native Ruby Regexp when querying in-memory documents. Please ensure that all uses of Ruby's Regexp class refer to it with the explicit syntax: ``::Regexp``.

This minor release supports version 3.4 of the MongoDB server. It has all the changes listed for version 5.2.0.rc0 as well as the following:
- Add filename and line number to class_eval and module_eval calls (@ivanovaleksey)
- Documentation updates (@artfuldodger)
- Address Ruby warnings (@amatsuda)
- Documentation updates (@rakusai)
- Update Relations::Reflections.reflect_on_all_associations method (@ivanovaleksey)
- Consider nested hashes when updating (@sivagollapalli)
- [MONGOID-4405](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4405) Fix querying on Models with cyclic relations

This minor release supports version 3.4 of the MongoDB server. It has all the changes listed for version 6.1.0.rc0 as well as the following:
- Add filename and line number to class_eval and module_eval calls (@ivanovaleksey)
- Documentation updates (@artfuldodger)
- Address Ruby warnings (@amatsuda)
- Documentation updates (@rakusai)
- Update Relations::Reflections.reflect_on_all_associations method (@ivanovaleksey)
- Consider nested hashes when updating (@sivagollapalli)
- [MONGOID-4405](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4405) Fix querying on Models with cyclic relations

name: 5.2.0.rc0
body:
This release candidate includes support for the new features of server version 3.4, among other smaller changes:
- Refactored map reduce internals
- [MONGOID-4398](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4398) Synchronize driver client creation
- Don't use unless with else (@ivanovaleksey)
- [MONGOID-4237](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4237) Extend BSON::Decimal128 so it can be evolved in queries
- [MONGOID-4326](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4326) Support collation in queries
- [MONGOID-4328](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4328) Allow app_name to be set in mongoid.yml
- [MONGOID-4327](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4327) Ensure that max_staleness is exposed as a read pref option

name: 6.1.0.rc0
body:
This release candidate includes support for the new features of server version 3.4, among other smaller changes:
- Refactored map reduce internals
- [MONGOID-4398](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4398) Synchronize driver client creation
- Don't use unless with else (@ivanovaleksey)
- [MONGOID-4237](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4237) Extend BSON::Decimal128 so it can be evolved in queries
- [MONGOID-4326](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4326) Support collation in queries
- [MONGOID-4328](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4328) Allow app_name to be set in mongoid.yml
- [MONGOID-4327](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4327) Ensure that max_staleness is exposed as a read pref option

This patch release has the following fixes:
- [MONGOID-3490](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3490) Fix Fields::Localized#lookup to work with boolean.
- [MONGOID-4360](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4360) Fix text search used in Aggregation pipeline.
- [MONGOID-4365](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4365) Allow partial iteration when eager loading.
- Allow map_reduce to use read preference of client (@cesar-tonnoir)
- Prefix Readonly#_loaded? method to avoid namespace pollution (@romanlehnert)
- Bypass the query cache when reloading a document (@eugeneius)

This patch release has the following fixes:
- [MONGOID-3490](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3490) Fix Fields::Localized#lookup to work with boolean.
- [MONGOID-4360](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4360) Fix text search used in Aggregation pipeline.
- [MONGOID-4365](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4365) Allow partial iteration when eager loading.
- Allow map_reduce to use read preference of client (@cesar-tonnoir)
- Include sort option in cache key (@jefmathiot)
- Bypass the query cache when reloading a document (@eugeneius)

This release only has one change but was necessary because of a bug introduced into 6.0.1 by the fix to ticket [MONGOID-4310](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4310)

The bug reports can be found here:
- [MONGOID-4357](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4357), [MONGOID-4358](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4358) Fix merging criteria selectors when objects in a list do not respond to the #| method.

This patch level release has the following bug fixes:
- [MONGOID-4315](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4315) Eager load objects when criteria docs are enumerated multiple times
- [MONGOID-4350](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4350) Fix counter_cache update when foreign_key isn't default (@TheSmartnik)
- [MONGOID-4313](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4313), [MONGOID-4317](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4317)  Fix Includes throwing NoMethodError when document is nil
- [MONGOID-3407](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3407) Fix setting a hash field with atomic operator
- [MONGOID-4310](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4310) Chained $in clauses should be an intersection.
- Add docs for create/remove indexes called on models (@miguelgraz)
- Don't fail when doing a localized attribute lookup which has a nil value after object initialization (@nicolasblanco)
- Add support for clone documents that have nil legacy attributes. (@okoriko)

This patch level release has the following bug fixes:
- [MONGOID-4315](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4315) Eager load objects when criteria docs are enumerated multiple times
- [MONGOID-4350](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4350) Fix counter_cache update when foreign_key isn't default (@TheSmartnik)
- [MONGOID-4313](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4313), [MONGOID-4317](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4317)  Fix Includes throwing NoMethodError when document is nil
- [MONGOID-3407](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3407) Fix setting a hash field with atomic operator
- Use right database when override_database + options. (@sylvain-8422)

This is the general release of Mongoid 6.0, which supports Rails 5.
Please see the release notes for version [6.0.0.beta](https://github.com/mongodb/mongoid/releases/tag/v6.0.0.beta) and [6.0.0.rc0](https://github.com/mongodb/mongoid/releases/tag/v6.0.0.rc0) for more details on changes since the 5.x series.

_Please note that JRuby 9.0 preforms much slower and uses more memory than we've seen with previous JRuby and Mongoid versions. You may want to put off upgrading to JRuby 9.0 + Mongoid 6.0 until the JRuby team has resolved some performance issues. [Here](https://github.com/jruby/jruby/issues/4012) is the relevant github issue with the JRuby project._

This release contains the following changes in addition to those list in the beta and rc0 versions of Mongoid 6.0.0.
- Require Ruby driver >= 2.3 so that keys can be validated upon insert.
- [MONGOID-3843](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3843) Ensure that the output db is queried in mapReduce operations.
- [MONGOID-4173 ](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4173) Fix nested eager loading.
- [MONGOID-4280](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4280) Allow both Strings and Symbols to be used when accessing values in the as_document object.
- [MONGOID-4313](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4313) Fix nil errors in Eager loading.
- Avoid NoMethodError when using #__nested__ (@quinn)
- Update list of tested Ruby versions in Readme (@tricknotes)
- Documentation updates for 6.0

This patch release has the following bug fixes:
- [MONGOID-4300](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4300) Don't double set a relation.
- [MONGOID-4289](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4289) Fix cloning with embedded translations.
- [MONGOID-4275](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4275) Ensure existing translations are used when a field is localized.
- Criteria#map uses #pluck, not #only (@Benjamin-Dobell)
- [MONGOID-4296](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4296) Fix regression with #only and embedded fields
- Add mongodb.com docs to repository

name: 6.0.0.rc0
body:
This is the first release candidate of Mongoid 6.0, which supports Rails 5.

The following changes are in rc0, in addition to the changes noted for the 6.0 beta release.

### Bug fixes
- [MONGOID-4289](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4289) Fix cloning with embedded translations (@eric-pigeon)
- [MONGOID-4300](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4300) Don't double-set a relation
- [MONGOID-4304](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4304) Accept extra field for association 'touch' option (@duhast)
- Fix hbtm eager loading (@ElMassimo) 

### API and behavior changes
- [MONGOID-4052](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4052) #only and #without methods are not scoped to specific locales, unless user explicitly does so. (@johnnyshields)
- Adjust Proxy equality methods (@marshalium)
- Criteria#map uses #pluck, not #only (@Benjamin-Dobell)

### Improvements and features
- [MONGOID-4301](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4301) Support $elemMatch in Matchable#matches? (@jonhyman)
- Make Proxy undef regex more precise (@marshalium)
- Incorporated Mongoid documentation into repository.
- [MONGOID-4274](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4274) Add QueryChache to the docs and take out Origin references
- Improve test suite performance and ensure that new connections get closed

name: 6.0.0.beta
body:
This is a beta release of Mongoid 6.0, which supports Rails 5.

Mongoid 6.0 has a number of bug fixes, API changes, and improvements:

### Bug fixes
- [MONGOID-3243](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3243) #find_or_create_by does not respect dynamic collection setting.
- [MONGOID-3551](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3551) Fix adding nested documents to nested relation using accepts_nested_attributes_for
- [MONGOID-4228](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4228) Fix using $not, $and, $or on embedded document queries. (@jonhyman)
- [MONGOID-4241](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4241) Only update timestamp when calling #touch, regardless of what other changes are pending. (@connerfritz)
- [MONGOID-4272](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4272) Fix replacing relation when it is already set as an instance variable.

### API and behavior changes
- [MONGOID-4268](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4268) Mongoid 6 behavior changes
- [MONGOID-3535](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3535) Don't consider document readonly if #only or #without are used. Allow loaded attributes to be changed.
- [MONGOID-3727](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3727) Don't mutate criteria object when calling #reorder
- [MONGOID-3833](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3833) Return false instead of raising an exception when using comparison operators on inappropriate types.
- [MONGOID-3944](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3944) Support #create_with method.
- [MONGOID-4019](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4019), [MONGOID-4182](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4182) Don't include Mongoi::Attributes::Dynamic when cloning documents with unknown attributes.
- [MONGOID-4165](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4165) Fix inconsistent BigDecimal#mongoize behavior (@johnnyshields)
- [MONGOID-4167](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4167) Raise an exception if Model#with is called with invalid driver options.
- [MONGOID-4175](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4175) Add option to include or exclude sort when using #first or #last ( @PedroEscudero and @Juanchote)
- [MONGOID-4180](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4180) Require a parent for a child in a belongs_to relation.
- [MONGOID-4193](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4193) Override attributes in criteria's selector with write method's attributes.
- [MONGOID-4226](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4226) Require ruby > 2.2.2
- [MONGOID-4264](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4264) Require belongs_to by default and provide options to override requirement.
- [MONGOID-4270](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4270) Take out run_targeted_callbacks
- [MONGOID-4239](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4239) Validate field names.

### Improvements and features
- [MONGOID-4012](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4012) Add max_time_ms as an option on Criteria.
- [MONGOID-4261](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4261), [MONGOID-3887](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3887) Assign hash attributes in #first_or_\* methods on Criteria.
- [MONGOID-3074](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3074) Consider time zones when returning distinct query results
- [MONGOID-3158](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3158) DateTime#mongoize and Date#mongoize return nil for invalid strings.
- [MONGOID-3842](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3842) Allow cache timestamp format to be changed. (@DouweM)
- [MONGOID-3875](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3875) Note in documentation that Mongoid::Attributes::Dynamic is needed when using counter_cache.
- [MONGOID-4129](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4129) Close connections opened by calling #with.
- [MONGOID-4218](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4218) Support Rails 5
- [MONGOID-4225](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4225) Incorporate separate Origin gem into Mongoid's codebase.
- [MONGOID-4266](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4266) Support passing multiple contexts to #valid?
- [MONGOID-4267](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4267) Support #attr_name_previously_changed? and #attr_name_previous_change
- Add sorting options to the cache key (@jefmathiot)
- Don't allow method names containing hyphens (@tdonia)

### Closed tickets without fix needed
- [MONGOID-3531](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3531)
- [MONGOID-3588](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3588) 
- [MONGOID-3716](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3716)
- [MONGOID-3729](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3729)
- [MONGOID-3753](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3753)
- [MONGOID-3799](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3799) 
- [MONGOID-3909](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3909)
- [MONGOID-3924](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3924)
- [MONGOID-4105](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4105)
- [MONGOID-4124](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4124)
- [MONGOID-4147](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4147)
- [MONGOID-4149](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4149)
- [MONGOID-4161](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4161)
- [MONGOID-4212](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4212)
- [MONGOID-4265](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4265)
- [MONGOID-4269](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4269)

This patch-level release has the following fixes:
- [MONGOID-4260](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4260) Respect locale in field predicate methods.
- [MONGOID-3735](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3735) Allow a relation to be defined as a shard key.
- Fix regression with blank fields (@tagliala)
- Revert [MONGOID-3887](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3887) because of issue documented in  [MONGOID-4261](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4261)

This patch-level release has the following fixes:
- [MONGOID-3887](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3887) Allow a hash field to be set through criteria create metod.
- [MONGOID-4240](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4240) Update documentation for Criteria#pluck behavior.
- [MONGOID-4246](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4246) Properly convert objects related via polymorphic assoc in queries.
- [MONGOID-4244](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4244) Duplicate of [MONGOID-4246](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4246).
- [MONGOID-3407](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3407) Reverted fix from release 5.1.1.
- [MONGOID-3930](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3930) Confirmed that it's no longer an issue.
- [MONGOID-4252](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4252) Extract field name from a projection using dot notation.
- [MONGOID-4260](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4260) Respect localization in predicate method definitions.
- Fix touch to only update timestamp and opt. field (@connerfritz)

This patch-level release has the following changes and fixes:
- Fix for handling $not in $and and $or Matchers (@jonhyman)
- [MONGOID-3551](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3551) Fix adding documents to nested relation using accepts_nested_attributes_for. (@hck)
- [MONGOID-3558](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3558) Spec added to show it's no longer an issue.
- [MONGOID-4233](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4233) Don't override Rails logger levels with Mongoid's config.
- [MONGOID-4238](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4238) Reset readonly state after reloading document.
- Update the mongoid config template comments to reflect that ssl_verify is on by default. (@danarnold)

This minor release of Mongoid has the following bug fixes and new features:
- [MONGOID-3644](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3644): Spec added to show it's no longer an issue.
- [MONGOID-4196](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4196): Ensure use of persistence_options are threadsafe.
- [MONGOID-4202](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4202): Support using $not in embedded document queries. @jonhyman
- [MONGOID-4190](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4190): Allow Model#with to accept a block to avoid growing open connections.
- [MONGOID-4213](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4213): Fix eager loading with deleted HABTM relations
- [MONGOID-3758](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3758): Spec added to show it's no longer an issue.
- [MONGOID-3702](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3702): Support finding by JSON-dumped object ids
- [MONGOID-3630](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3630): Support compacting a document as json
- [MONGOID-4211](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4211): Fix before/after add callbacks executing when binding one-many relations
- [MONGOID-3246](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3246): Spec added to show it's no longer an issue
- [MONGOID-3565](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3565): Duplicate of MONGOID-4211
- [MONGOID-3121](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3121): Already implemented.
- [MONGOID-3895](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3895): Support tailable cursors
- [MONGOID-3937](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3937): Support option to not use fallbacks for a localized field.
- [MONGOID-3968](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3968): Duplicate of MONGOID-3937
- [MONGOID-3776](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3776): Support specifying a block as default scope
- [MONGOID-3933](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3933): Support nesting atomically blocks
- [MONGOID-4031](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4031): Won't fix; (unwind operator) supported already in driver
- [MONGOID-2729](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-2729): Won't fix; use nullify option
- [MONGOID-3944](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3944): Support #create_with
- [MONGOID-2533](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-2533): Won't fix
- [MONGOID-3522](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3522): Support using the $comment query modifer
- [MONGOID-4093](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4093): Won't fix
- [MONGOID-3645](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3645): Won't fix
- [MONGOID-3739](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3739): Default values for inherited models works as designed
- [MONGOID-3640](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3640): Support text search
- [MONGOID-3652](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3652): Allow geo near queries in scopes
- [MONGOID-3924](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3924): Won't fix errors in submodels
- [MONGOID-2020](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-2020): Already implemented in MONGOID-3924
- [MONGOID-4173](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4173): Support nested eager loading
- [MONGOID-3871](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3871): Duplicated of MONGOID-4173
- [MONGOID-4116](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4116): Won't support bulk creation of models
- [MONGOID-3277](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3277): Won't fix elem_match and atomically
- [MONGOID-3885](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3885): Won't add controller runtime details
- [MONGOID-4220](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4220): Update gemspec to require Origin gem >= 2.2
- [MONGOID-3882](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3882): Update documentation for details regarding using counter_cache and dynamic attributes
- [MONGOID-3851](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3851): Works as designed.
- [MONGOID-3762](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3762): Fix polymorphic foreign key conversion
- [MONGOID-3693](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3693): Duplicate of MONGOID-3762
- [MONGOID-3606](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3606): Duplicate of MONGOID-3762
- [MONGOID-4197](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4197): Logger level is configurable in Mongoid config
- [MONGOID-4198](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4198): Fix chained scopes on Embedded documents

name: v5.0.2
body:
This release has a number of fixes for bugs in the backlog, community contributions, and tests added to show some issues no longer exist.
- [MONGOID-4113](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4113) Spec added, no longer an issue
- [MONGOID-3659](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3659) Spec added, no longer an issue
- [MONGOID-3697](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3697) Hash.mongoize returns a new hash
- [MONGOID-3782](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3782) Spec added, no longer an issue
- [MONGOID-3709](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3709) Support nested polymorphic association assignment
-  [RUBY-1060](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/RUBY-1060) Set mongo logger to mongoid logger
-  [MONGOID-4137](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4137) Fix no method error for 'substitute'
-  [MONGOID-4128](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4128) Don't use $in if 1 subclass in criteria
-  [MONGOID-3919](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3919) Spec added, no longer an issue
-  [MONGOID-4181](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4181) Spec added, no longer an issue
-  [MONGOID-3808](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3808) Don't update db if validation fails
-  [MONGOID-2984](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-2984) Don't update db if validation fails
- Remove deprecations form 5.0
- [MONGOID-4189](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-4189) Use index name for comparing text indexes
- [RUBY-1072](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/RUBY-1072) Add limit of 1 to Model#first and Model#last to avoid leaving cursors open
-  [MONGOID-3417](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3417) Spec added, no longer an issue
-  [MONGOID-3407](https://jira.mongodb.org/browse/MONGOID-3407) Support using dot notation for attribute assignment (@sivagollapalli)
- Support partial indexes (@amw)
